item.title: ROKU
item.description: score:130 Chances: The expanded partnership with Cross Screen Media will provide a significant opportunity for Roku to accurately measure spend on its inventory and leverage ACR viewership data for precise audience targeting. Roku is experiencing pressure now, but this might just be an excellent opportunity for investors to enter the market and capitalize on its potential comeback.

item.title: WBD
item.description: score:27 Chances: The merger between Warner Bros. item.title: NFLX
item.description: score:115 Chances: Netflix (NFLX) stock has continued its robust rally off its mid-2022 lows. With Squid Game: The Challenge reality series leaning on the strength of its impressive Squid Game franchise and new plans for its video game business, it’s hard not to feel better about the company’s growth story moving into 2024.
